cmd.description: full command as typed into console right before hitting enter

daemon.description: if set true, run command without any output

detached.description: if set true, build will launch command then 'succeed' without waiting for command to finish. Useful for launching services/servers that don't terminate.

kill.description: kills a running cmd-target. Useful for stopping cmd-targets with (detached:true)

killChildren.description: also kill any descendant processes the cmd-target spawned
